N

NotificationManager - Class in librarySE.managers
Handles automated user notifications related to borrowed library items.
NotificationManager(BorrowManager) - Constructor for class librarySE.managers.NotificationManager
Constructs a new NotificationManager with a reference to the BorrowManager for accessing borrowing data.
Notifier - Interface in librarySE.managers.notifications
Defines a contract for sending notifications to users within the library system.
notify(User, String, String) - Method in class librarySE.managers.notifications.EmailNotifier
Sends an email notification to the specified user.
notify(User, String, String) - Method in interface librarySE.managers.notifications.Notifier
Sends a notification message to the specified user.
